text: agar (jange ohad mein) tumako zakhm laga hai to usee tarah (badar mein) tumhaare fareeq (kuphfaar ko) bhee zakhm lag chuka hai (us par unakee himmat to na tootee) ye ittafaaqaate zamaana hain jo ham logon ke daramiyaan baaree baaree ulat pher kiya karate hain aur ye (ittafaaqee shikast isalie thee) taaki khuda sachche eemaanadaaron ko (zaahiree) musalamaanon se alag dekh len aur tumamen se baaz ko darajae shahaadat par faayaz karen aur khuda (hukme rasool se) sarataabee karane vaalon ko dost nahin rakhata
